description: Intended as a capstone course for the major, the seminar studies a selected topic, figure, or movement in philosophy, with emphasis on independent research and student presentations. Consult department's prospectus for details. May be repeated if topics are different. Prerequisite: upper-level philosophy major or consent of instructor. Offered annually.
name: Sem: Kant's Eth, Rel, Pol
notes: Prerequisite: Two courses in Philosophy, one of which must be
Phil 235 or Phil 236. Open to rising Seniors and Juniors only.
prerequisites: upper-level philosophy major or consent of instructor. Offered annually.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: upper-level philosophy major or consent of instructor. Offered annually.

title: Senior Seminar
